amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to increasing the Family Funds limit of the Small Business Investment Company Program from $225,000,000 to $350,000,000, as passed by the Committee in 2013, which is zero subsidy and funded entirely through fees paid by investors and businesses.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 440 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 440 proposed by Senator Cardin. (consideration: CR S1966-1967; text: CR S1966) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to increasing the Family Funds limit of the Small Business Investment Company Program from $225,000,000 to $350,000,000, as passed by the Committee in 2013, which is zero subsidy and funded entirely through fees paid by investors and businesses.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 440 proposed by Senator Cardin.
